vidis.data.sim
Interface ISimNodeCon

All Superinterfaces:
IAComponentCon
All Known Implementing Classes:
SimNode
public interface ISimNodeCon
extends IAComponentCon

this class provides all functions of a node that a module writer may need.

Author:
dominik

          send a packet over a link
 void send(IUserPacket p, IUserLink link, long wait)

send

send a packet over a link

Parameters:

link - the link which is used to send

send

void send(IUserPacket p,
          IUserLink link,
          long wait)
send a packet over a link; the packet send is delayed for some amount of time which may be interpreted as the processing time

Parameters:
p - the packet to send
link - the link which is used to send
wait - the amount of time to wait
